song_name: Final Fantasy IV Boss Battle Theme
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Final Fantasy IV Boss Battle Theme is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Final Fantasy IV Boss Battle Theme has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Minor,  and F Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
